mapper.select: SELECT A.MED_ID , A.ALARM_ID , B.ALARM_TYPE , B.ALARM_TIME , C.MED_NAME , C.START_DATE , C.END_DATE , C.MED_STATUS , D.SCHE_CHK FROM schedule A JOIN alarm_set B ON A.ALARM_ID = B.ALARM_ID JOIN med_info C ON A.MED_ID = C.MED_ID LEFT JOIN ( SELECT ALARM_TYPE , SCHE_CHK FROM sche_log WHERE LOG_STATUS = 'Y' AND USER_ID = #{userId} ) AS D ON D.ALARM_TYPE = B.ALARM_TYPE WHERE C.USER_ID = #{userId} AND ALARM_USE_AT = 'Y' ORDER BY B.ALARM_TYPE , A.MED_ID
SELECT A.MED_ID , A.ALARM_ID FROM schedule A JOIN alarm_set B ON A.ALARM_ID = B.ALARM_ID WHERE( A.MED_ID , B.ALARM_TYPE ) IN( (#{medId}, #{alarmType}) )
